content.rendered:
“I can’t thank you enough for what you’ve given me – a whole new body, practically. I am so overwhelmingly happy with the result already. This had given me a whole new self-esteem and I am still high from it. Thank you both so much for everything. See you soon.”

-Q.L.

“I took my 3 yr old son to get surgery. He was born with his tongue attached to his front teeth and at birth the doctor told us not to operate unless it was causing him a problem. I noticed that when he started getting his teeth his front teeth were separating because of this reason. So I decided to take him to Dr. Lee. I was a patient there 4 years ago and had a great experience that’s why I decided to take my son too. At first I thought my son was able to do surgery with just local anesthetic but then decided to do it under general anesthesia. The nurses made him really comfortable and were showing him a spray that numbs the area before putting the needle in. After the surgery he woke up and first thing he told me was that he didn’t feel the needle going in. He had very minimal pain and recovered really fast. I would highly recommend Dr. Lee for oral surgery on adults and children.”

-Josuna

“I wish to thank you for the eyelid surgery you recently performed on me. It has been a great success. It has only been six weeks since the procedure and even though the swelling has not totally subsided the results still look terrific. I now look the same age as I feel.

“I initially had some apprehension about eyelid surgery. The idea of me, a male, having cosmetic surgery bothered me. I also was concerned about the risks involved. Knowing two of your former patients and seeing the results of your eyelid procedures on them convinced me that there was very little technical risks involved.

“I am very glad I had the surgery and especially that it was performed by you. I would not hesitate recommending you to anyone desiring cosmetic surgery.”

-C.L.

“Dr. Jeffrey Lee removed the fat deposits under my eyes with skillful precision and care.

“Understanding my anxiety and fear about getting any surgery done, he made certain that I felt secure about the procedure by describing in full detail the whole process. After my consultation with Dr. Lee, I felt at ease and confident in his skills.

“I am very pleased with the results of the procedure. Dr. Lee’s commitment to excellence in his surgical skills as well as in his care to his patients is exceptional and must be commended.”

-Anonymous

“I wanted to thank you for the great care I received from your office. Your professionalism and expertise exceeded my best expectations. I appreciated the time you took to address my concerns and questions. I also appreciated the extra attention you demonstrated.

“I will definitely be recommending my friends and family to you. Once again, thank you for all that you did.”

-S.T.
